35 bool _dirty = false;

43 cydui::dimensions::component_dimensions_t dim;

51 template<class c>
52 concept ComponentConcept = requires {
53 typename c::Props;
54 typename c::State;
55 {
56 c::props
57 } -> std::convertible_to<typename c::Props>;
58 {
59 c::Name
60 } -> std::convertible_to<const char*>;
61 };
62
63 struct component_builder_t {
64 // Geometric constraints
65 std::optional <cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t> x;
66 std::optional <cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t> y;
67 std::optional <cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t> w;
68 std::optional <cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t> h;
69
70 std::function<Component*(component_builder_t)> build;
71 };
72
73 template<typename c> requires ComponentConcept<c>
74 struct c_init_t {
75 typename c::State** ref = nullptr;
76 typename c::Props props;
77
78 // Geometric constraints
79 std::optional <cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t> x;
80 std::optional <cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t> y;
81 std::optional <cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t> w;
82 std::optional <cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t> h;
83
84 std::vector <component_builder_t> inner = {};
85
86 std::function<void(c*)> init = [](c*) {
87 };
88 };
89
90 class Component {
91
92 std::function<void(Component*)> inner_redraw = [](Component*) {
93 };
94
95 bool is_group = false;
96
97 private:
98 template<typename c>
99 requires ComponentConcept<c>
100 static std::function<void(Component*)> get_init_function(c_init_t<c> init, const component_builder_t &spec) {
101 return [init, spec](cydui::components::Component* __raw_local_) {
102 auto* local = (c*) __raw_local_;
103
104 __raw_local_->state.let(_(ComponentState *, {
105 if (spec.x.has_value())
106 it->dim.x = spec.x.value();
107 else if (init.x.has_value())
108 it->dim.x = init.x.value();
109
110 if (spec.y.has_value())
111 it->dim.y = spec.y.value();
112 else if (init.y.has_value())
113 it->dim.y = init.y.value();
114
115 if (spec.w.has_value()) {
116 it->dim.w = spec.w.value();
117 it->dim.given_w = true;
118 } else if (init.w.has_value()) {
119 it->dim.w = init.w.value();
120 it->dim.given_w = true;
121 }
122 if (spec.h.has_value()) {
123 it->dim.h = spec.h.value();
124 it->dim.given_h = true;
125 } else if (init.h.has_value()) {
126 it->dim.h = init.h.value();
127 it->dim.given_h = true;
128 }
129 }));
130
131 local->add(init.inner);
132 init.init(local);
133 };
134 }
135
136 protected:
137
138#define SET_REFERENCE if (init.ref) *(init.ref) =
139#define SET_WINDOW(STATE) (STATE)->win = it->win
140#define INSTANTIATE_COMP(STATE) new c(STATE, init.props, get_init_function(init))
141
142 template<typename c, int ID>
143 requires ComponentConcept<c>
144 inline component_builder_t create(c_init_t<c> init) const {
145 return {
146 .x = init.x,
147 .y = init.y,
148 .w = init.w,
149 .h = init.h,
150 .build = *(state.let(_(ComponentState *, {
151 auto* st = (typename c::State*) (it->children.contains(ID)
152 ? (it->children[ID])
153 : (it->children.add(ID, new typename c::State())));
154 st->win = it->win;
155 return st;
156 })).let(_(typename c::State*, {
157 SET_REFERENCE it;
158 return [=](component_builder_t spec) {
159 auto* _c = new c(it, init.props, get_init_function(init, spec));
160 return _c;
161 };
162 })).unwrap())
163 };
164 }
165
166 template<typename c, int ID, typename T>
167 requires ComponentConcept<c>
168 inline component_builder_t create_for(
169 const T &iter, std::function<c_init_t<c>(const typename T::value_type &)> block
170 ) const {
171 std::vector<typename c::State*> states = {};
172 state.let(_(ComponentState *, {
173 int k = 0;
174 for (auto a = iter.begin(); a != iter.end(); ++a, ++k) {
175 auto* st =
176 (typename c::State*) (it->children.contains(ID, k)
177 ? (it->children.get_list(ID, k))
178 : (it->children.add_list(ID, k, new typename c::State())));
179 st->win = it->win;
180 states.push_back(st);
181 }
182 }));
183
184 return {
185 .x = std::nullopt,
186 .y = std::nullopt,
187 .w = std::nullopt,
188 .h = std::nullopt,
189 .build = [iter, block, states](component_builder_t spec) {
190 int i = 0;
191 auto temp_c = Component::new_group();
192 for (auto a = iter.begin(); a != iter.end(); ++a, ++i) {
193 const c_init_t<c> init = block(*a);
194 SET_REFERENCE nullptr;
195 temp_c->children.push_back(
196 new c(states[i], init.props, get_init_function(init, spec))
197 );
198 }
199 return temp_c;
200 },
201 };
202 }
203
204 inline component_builder_t create_group(std::vector <component_builder_t> _children) const {
205 return {
206 .build = [_children](const component_builder_t &) {
207 auto* group = Component::new_group();
208 group->add(_children);
209 return group;
210 }
211 };
212 }
213
214#undef SET_REFERENCE
215#undef SET_WINDOW
216#undef INSTANTIATE_COMP
217
218
219#define NULLCOMP {.x = std::nullopt, .y = std::nullopt, .w = std::nullopt, .h = std::nullopt, .build = [](component_builder_t){ return Component::new_group(); } }
220
221#define COMP(COMPONENT) create<COMPONENT, __COUNTER__>
222
223#define GROUP create_group
224
225#define IF(CONDITION) [&,this]()->component_builder_t { if (CONDITION) return
226#define ELSE else return
227#define ELSE_IF(CONDITION) else if(CONDITION) return
228
229#define WHEN(VARIABLE) [&,this]()->component_builder_t { auto value = VARIABLE;
230#define CASE(VALUE) if (value == VALUE) return
231#define END return NULLCOMP; }()
232
233#define FOR_EACH(COMPONENT) create_for<COMPONENT, __COUNTER__>
234

265#define COMP_EVENT_HANDLER(EV, ARGS) virtual void on_##EV ARGS const
266#define COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_OVERRIDE(EV, ARGS) virtual void on_##EV ARGS const override
267
268 typedef typename KeyEvent::DataType KeyData;
269
270 COMP_EVENT_HANDLER(redraw, ());
271
272 COMP_EVENT_HANDLER(render, (vg::vg_fragment_t & graphics));
273
274 COMP_EVENT_HANDLER(mouse_enter, (int x, int y));
275
276 COMP_EVENT_HANDLER(mouse_exit, (int x, int y));
277
278 COMP_EVENT_HANDLER(mouse_motion, (int x, int y));
279
280 COMP_EVENT_HANDLER(mouse_click, (int x, int y, int button));
281
282 COMP_EVENT_HANDLER(drag_start, (int x, int y));
283
284 COMP_EVENT_HANDLER(drag_motion, (int x, int y));
285
286 COMP_EVENT_HANDLER(drag_finish, (int x, int y));
287
288 COMP_EVENT_HANDLER(scroll, (int dx, int dy));
289
290 COMP_EVENT_HANDLER(key_press, (KeyData key));
291
292 COMP_EVENT_HANDLER(key_release, (KeyData key));
293
294#define REDRAW COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_OVERRIDE(redraw, ())
295#define RENDER virtual bool is_drawable() const override {return true;} COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_OVERRIDE(render, (vg::vg_fragment_t& graphics))
296#define ON_KEY_RELEASE(KEY) COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_OVERRIDE(key_release, (KeyData (KEY)))
297#define ON_KEY_PRESS(KEY) COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_OVERRIDE(key_press, (KeyData (KEY)))
298#define ON_SCROLL(DX, DY) COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_OVERRIDE(scroll, (int (DX), int (DY)))
299#define ON_CLICK(X, Y, BUTTON) COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_OVERRIDE(mouse_click, (int (X), int (Y), int (BUTTON)))
300#define ON_MOUSE_MOTION(X, Y) COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_OVERRIDE(mouse_motion, (int (X), int (Y)))
301#define ON_MOUSE_EXIT(X, Y) COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_OVERRIDE(mouse_exit, (int (X), int (Y)))
302#define ON_MOUSE_ENTER(X, Y) COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_OVERRIDE(mouse_enter, (int (X), int (Y)))
303#define ON_DRAG_START(X, Y) COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_OVERRIDE(drag_start, (int (X), int (Y)))
304#define ON_DRAG_MOTION(X, Y) COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_OVERRIDE(drag_motion, (int (X), int (Y)))
305#define ON_DRAG_FINISH(X, Y) COMP_EVENT_HANDLER_OVERRIDE(drag_finish, (int (X), int (Y)))
306 };
307
308 // Dynamic Builder for when you need an extra bit of flexibility
309 // They can keep building components and states forever, and it remembers which kind!
310 template<components::ComponentConcept C>
311 struct dynamic_builder_impl_t;
312
313 struct dynamic_builder_t {
314 private:
315 std::function<void(dynamic_builder_t*)> destroyer = [](dynamic_builder_t* it) {
316 delete it;
317 };
318 public:
319 template<components::ComponentConcept C>
320 static dynamic_builder_t* create() {
321 dynamic_builder_t* db = new dynamic_builder_impl_t<C>;
322 db->destroyer = [](dynamic_builder_t* it) {
323 delete (dynamic_builder_impl_t <C>*) it;
324 };
325 return db;
326 }
327
328 virtual ~dynamic_builder_t() = default;
329
330 static void destroy(dynamic_builder_t* builder) {
331 builder->destroyer(builder);
332 }
333
334 virtual components::ComponentState* build_state() = 0;
335
336 struct comp_init_t {
337 components::ComponentState* state = nullptr;
338 void* props_ptr = nullptr;
339 cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t x = 0;
340 cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t y = 0;
341 cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t w = 0;
342 cydui::dimensions::dimensional_relation_t h = 0;
343 std::function<void(components::Component*)> init = [](components::Component*) {
344 };
345 };
346
347 virtual component_builder_t build_component(const comp_init_t &init) = 0;
348 };
349
350 template<components::ComponentConcept C>
351 struct dynamic_builder_impl_t: public dynamic_builder_t {
352 ~dynamic_builder_impl_t() override = default;
353
354 C::State* build_state() override {
355 return new C::State();
356 }
357
358 component_builder_t build_component(const comp_init_t &init) override {
359 typename C::Props props = (init.props_ptr == nullptr) ? typename C::Props() : *(typename C::Props*) init.props_ptr;
360 if (init.props_ptr != nullptr) delete (typename C::Props*) init.props_ptr;
361 return {
362 .x = init.x,
363 .y = init.y,
364 .w = init.w,
365 .h = init.h,
366 .build = [props, init](component_builder_t spec) {
367 return new C((typename C::State*) init.state, props, [spec, init](components::Component* __c) {
368 __c->state.let(_(ComponentState *, {
369 it->dim.given_h = true;
370 it->dim.given_w = true;
371 it->dim.x = spec.x.value();
372 it->dim.y = spec.y.value();
373 it->dim.w = spec.w.value();
374 it->dim.h = spec.h.value();
375 }));
376
377 init.init(__c);
378 });
379 }
380 };
381 }
382 };
383

388#define STATE(NAME) struct NAME##State: public cydui::components::ComponentState
389
390#define INIT_STATE(NAME) \
391 explicit NAME##State(): cydui::components::ComponentState()
392
393#define COMPONENT(NAME) \
394 /*using namespace primitives;*/ \
395 struct NAME: public cydui::components::Component
396
397#define DISABLE_LOG this->log.on = false;
398#define ENABLE_LOG this->log.on = true;
399
400#define PROPS(...) \
401 struct Props __VA_ARGS__; \
402 Props props;
403
404#define NO_PROPS PROPS({})
405
406#define INIT(NAME) \
407 typedef NAME##State State; \
408 NAME##State* state = nullptr; \
409 static constexpr const char* Name = #NAME; \
410 logging::logger log = {.name = #NAME, .on = false}; \
411 explicit NAME(NAME##State* state, \
412 Props props, \
413 const std::function<void(cydui::components::Component*)>& inner) \
414 : cydui::components::Component(state, inner), props(std::move(props)), \
415 state(state)
416
417#define REFRESH \
418if (state->win) { \
419 events::emit<RedrawEvent>({ \
420 .win = (unsigned int)(*state->win.unwrap())->xwin, \
421 }); \
422} \
423
